segments.text: I notice the woman so absorbed in her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink water flows endlessly, unchecked.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's sad how unaware she is of the trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle grows, threatening slips and falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy balances precariously on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching for cookies, full of mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But one wrong move, and he'll tumble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waits eagerly, her little hand up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's touching, their sibling bond over treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, the risks make my heart heavy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The calm garden outside highlights the indoor peril.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel sorry for what might happen next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This ordinary moment could turn tragic so easily.
segments.speaker: PAR
